pr_title: Issue #1126: `pipe run` custom parameters parsing issue

timeline.message: Issue #1126: `pipe run` custom parameters parsing issue - fix for run parameters; each options group (option name + value) is separated by new line

timeline.bodyText: If parameters are empty, we need to add '--' here as well
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.message: Issue #1126: `pipe run` custom parameters parsing issue - fix for parent-id run parameter
